maryGeoise.name: Mary Geoise
maryGeoise.description: The capital of the World Government and home of the Celestial Dragons. Location of the Reverie and the mysterious ruler Im.

cards.title: Imu sitting on the Empty Throne
cards.description: Imu, the mysterious figure leading the World Government from the shadows, is seen sitting on the Empty Throne, breaking the rule that no one should occupy it.

cards.title: Kuma as a slave of the Tenryuubito
cards.description: Bartholomew Kuma is reduced to a mindless slave and used by the Celestial Dragons as personal transport in the Holy Land.

cards.title: Location of the Five Elders (Gorosei)
cards.description: The highest leaders of the World Government meet regularly in Mary Geoise to make crucial decisions about the world.

cards.title: Residence of the Celestial Dragons (Tenryuubito)
cards.description: The Celestial Dragons live in luxurious mansions isolated from the rest of the world, exercising absolute power without consequences.

germa66.name: Germa 66
germa66.description: A mobile military kingdom led by the Vinsmoke family. Known for its advanced cloning technology.

cards.title: Experiments on the children
cards.description: Judge, the patriarch of Germa, genetically modifies his children to turn them into emotionless super soldiers.

cards.title: Advanced technology: Cloning and Raid Suits
cards.description: Germa 66 possesses highly advanced combat technology, including power suits (Raid Suits) and mass cloning of soldiers.

cards.title: Sanji and Pudding's wedding
cards.description: An arranged marriage between Sanji and Charlotte Pudding is planned to unite the kingdoms of Germa and Big Mom, though it hides betrayals on both sides.

amazonLily.name: Amazon Lily
amazonLily.description: An island inhabited only by women. Home of the Kuja tribe and ruled by Boa Hancock.

cards.title: Luffy fights Hancock's sisters
cards.description: Luffy battles Boa Hancock's sisters in a public arena, accidentally revealing his Conqueror’s Haki.

cards.title: Hancock falls in love with Luffy
cards.description: For the first time, Boa Hancock feels love for someone: Luffy, for his courage, innocence, and refusal to be dazzled by superficial beauty.

cards.title: Blackbeard and Hancock face to face
cards.description: In the New World arc, Blackbeard and Hancock face off on Amazon Lily as the Marines attempt to capture the Shichibukai.

weatheria.name: Weatheria
weatheria.description: A floating sky island specializing in weather science. Nami trained here during the time skip.

cards.title: Nami arrives in Weatheria (after Sabaody)
cards.description: After the Straw Hats' separation, Nami is sent to Weatheria, a floating island focused on meteorology.

cards.title: Nami steals the book and escapes
cards.description: During her stay, Nami steals a valuable book about weather manipulation to better protect her crew in the future.

cards.title: Weatheria above the clouds
cards.description: The island floats using climate technology and is inhabited by scientists studying the world's weather patterns.

sabaody.name: Sabaody Archipelago
sabaody.description: Place where the Straw Hats met the Supernovas. Luffy punched a Celestial Dragon, leading to their defeat and separation by Kuma.

cards.title: Encounter with the Supernovas
cards.description: Luffy and his crew meet other powerful rookies with high bounties known as the Supernovas.

cards.title: Kuma appears
cards.description: Kuma, the Shichibukai, appears and starts making the Straw Hats disappear one by one, scattering them around the world.

cards.title: Kizaru attacks
cards.description: Admiral Kizaru arrives at the archipelago to capture the Supernovas and ruthlessly attacks with his light-speed powers.

elbaf.name: Elbaf
elbaf.description: Land of the giants and home of the strongest warriors. Closely tied to Big Mom’s past. Usopp dreams of visiting it.

cards.title: Duel between Dorry and Brogy
cards.description: Two giant warriors of Elbaf, Dorry and Brogy, fight every day for over a century for honor and pride.

cards.title: Big Mom’s disaster in Elbaf
cards.description: During her childhood, Big Mom causes a tragedy in Elbaf during a celebration, altering her destiny.

cards.title: Usopp dreams of becoming a hero in Elbaf
cards.description: Usopp dreams of becoming a brave warrior of the sea and earning recognition among the giants of Elbaf.

punkHazard.name: Punk Hazard
punkHazard.description: A dangerous island divided between fire and ice. Caesar Clown conducted experiments here. Beginning of the alliance against Kaido.

cards.title: Luffy and Law form an alliance
cards.description: Luffy and Trafalgar Law form a pirate alliance with the goal of toppling one of the Yonko: Kaido.

cards.title: Vergo vs. Law
cards.description: Law faces off against Vergo in a fierce battle inside the laboratory, using his powers to slice him in two.

cards.title: Caesar defeated by Luffy
cards.description: Luffy defeats Caesar Clown, the scientist behind inhumane experiments involving gas and chemical weapons.

cards.title: Island split between fire and ice
cards.description: Punk Hazard is divided by extreme weather as a result of a past battle between Akainu and Aokiji.

beehive.name: Beehive
beehive.description: Also known as Pirate Island. A pirate refuge currently ruled by Blackbeard. Former base of Rocks D. Xebec.

cards.title: Cradle of the Rocks Pirates
cards.description: The feared crew of Rocks D. Xebec originated on Beehive, an island infamous for pirate brutality.

cards.title: Blackbeard’s base
cards.description: After the fall of the Rocks, the island is taken over by Blackbeard, who uses it as his personal pirate stronghold.

cards.title: Fight between Garp and Kuzan (Aokiji)
cards.description: On Beehive, a fierce battle takes place between Garp, the Marine hero, and his former student Aokiji, now allied with Blackbeard.

cards.title: Coby captured by Blackbeard
cards.description: Coby is captured by Blackbeard’s crew on Beehive, prompting a rescue operation by SWORD.
